body_html:
Hi!
This can certainly be sped up to be much faster. The main issue is that the multinomial sampler uses a categorical sampler (unfortunately named tf.multinomial) underneath. We can actually construct an efficient binomial sampler, using a mix of inversion methods and Hormann's: https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/abs/10.1080/00949659308811496. From there, one can sample from a multinomial distribution through repeated binomial random variates.
